Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to eligibility for military enhanced recognition, incentive and tribute ("MERIT") scholarships
Summary: Clarifies the definition of severe and permanent disability for eligibility for military enhanced recognition, incentive and tribute ("MERIT") scholarships.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to eligibility for military enhanced recognition, incentive and tribute ("MERIT") scholarships
